title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.3 - Motions during hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.3 - Motions during hearing

State Regulations

All motions made during a hearing, except as otherwise
provided or permitted by the hearing officer, shall be made orally at the
hearing and shall be decided by the hearing officer. All such motions and the
rulings and orders thereon shall be part of the record of the
proceeding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
253.3

Renumbered from 253.5

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
